ST_InitialQuestMail.CredRewardFTUE:
Check out the <emphasis>decor app</> on your phone to get swag for your home! <3 Decorate however you want! (Itâ€™ll all be there the next time you log in and place your house). I <emphasis>sent you some Creds to get started</>! :D
So happy youâ€™re here! - <name>Mazy</>

ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_06_Body: (It's a stick figure sketch of a smiling NaNa holding out a wrapped present. This must be <emphasis>a gift from Peely</>!)
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_04_Body:
A new film is trying to drum up positive press by sending out <emphasis>swag</> to a few Brick Bay influencers, and you were at the top of their list!
Enjoy, <name>Kernel Poppy</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_16_Body:
As valedictorian, itâ€™s my pleasure to recognize anyone making the community a better place. Enjoy <emphasis>this gift</>, and thank you for being a credit to Brick Bay.
To the future! -<name>Victory Valedictorian</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_01_Body:
Hey champ. You're probably wondering, "Meowscles, how do you get so <b>swole</>?" Part of my trick: I use <emphasis>this one simple item</>.
<b>Never</> stop training, <name>Meowscles</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_27_Body:
Hey there! Weâ€™re picking a resident every day to award with <emphasis>a gift</> for superlative behavior - and today, thatâ€™s you! Please accept this token of celebration. Hereâ€™s to you!
- <name>Brite Bomber</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_05_Body:
Hey there, I see how hard you've been working lately and I gotta say, you're incredible! Here's <emphasis>a little something</> to show my appreciation.
Sincerely yours, <name>Hayseed</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_20_Body:
Hey there, speed demon. Found <emphasis>this</> tucked in the back of my garage and thought you might like it. Plus, I donâ€™t need any extra <negative>junk</> around here. Soâ€¦ enjoy.
<name>Veronika</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_07_Body:
Hey! I wanted to have a party <b>but</> didn't feel like going out so I thought, "I'll throw a postal party and just <emphasis>send my friends some gifts</>!"
Love, <name>Syd</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_30_Body:
Hey, buddy. I found <emphasis>this</> on the beach next to my nappinâ€™ rock. Dunno what it is, but I asked around and someone said it was yours?? If not, consider it a present! Back to my napâ€¦
- <name>Lizzik</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_03_Body:
Hey, party animal! A tourist <emphasis>left this at the club</> and never came back to claim it. It's totally your vibe, so now, it's yours!
Groovily, <name>Funk Ops</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_22_Body:
Heya! Bobom Milk Tea Cafe is having a Customer Celebration Day, so hereâ€™s <emphasis>a little token</> of our appreciation. (Also, Joni & Lucien say hiiiiii.)
Your favorite bobarista, <name>Helsie</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_13_Body:
I crashed my skateboard into a delivery truck and my deliveries got all mixed up with <b>those</> deliveries, so... here's the <emphasis>item</> you ordered? I hope?
Please don't tell my boss, <name>Pepper Roni</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_08_Body:
I don't want to make a big public thing about it... But I think you're awesome and I wanted to <emphasis>give you a present</>. <negative>Don't tell anyone I've got a soft side.</>
Or else, <name>Festival Lace</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_29_Body:
I have the sharpest senses in Brick Bay, and Iâ€™m not easy to impress. Youâ€™re a claw above the rest. Hereâ€™s <emphasis>a gift</> to congratulate you on showing your stripes.
- <name>Oscar</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_15_Body:
I recieved <emphasis>this piece of top-secret intel</>, and I wanted it to wind up in the hands of someone I trust. Use it wisely.
- <name>Agent Jones</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_17_Body:
I was casting a grammar spell on my Mourndale homework and accidentally summonedâ€¦ <emphasis>this</>?? It reminded me a little of you, soâ€¦ Consider it a gift!
Enchantedly yours, <name>Isabelle</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_21_Body:
If it isnâ€™t my favorite resident! This city just wouldnâ€™t be the same without you. Saw <emphasis>this</> and I thought you might like it. Check it out!
<name>Mazy</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_28_Body:
Itâ€™s been so fun, watching you blossom here in Brick Bay! Please accept this <emphasis>gift of appreciation</>â€¦ and keep on growing! Remember to hydrate!
- <name>Lavendra</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_24_Body:
Iâ€™m expanding my network of contacts in this city, in case I need assistance with some underhanded schemes. You seem like a candidate. Hereâ€™s <emphasis>a small token</> of my interest.
- <name>Marigold</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_23_Body:
Iâ€™ve been paying attention, and you strike me asâ€¦ interesting. Consider <emphasis>this gift</> an investment in your future. <negative>Donâ€™t bore me.</>
Best, <name>Midas</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_26_Body:
Iâ€™ve been snooping in all sorts of city files, and your name came up a whole bunch as someone whoâ€™s cool and fun. Hereâ€™s <emphasis>a present</>; letâ€™s be buds! (\(>x<")/) UwU.
<name>Mae</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_14_Body:
My grandmother is cleaning out her house to make space for her new drum kit. She told me to give <emphasis>this</> to the most hard-core, rock-and-roll person I know.
Go out and make Gramma Chum proud, <name>Big Chum</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_09_Body:
My studies at Mourndale Academy are paying off! I <b>finally</> got my hyper-electroradiator machine running and it produced this! But now it won't stop cranking them out, so I <emphasis>thought I'd give one to you</>.
Yours in science, <name>Grisabelle</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_08_Subject: Not a big deal or anything.
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_25_Subject: One friendâ€™s trash is another friendâ€™s treasure
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_25_Body:
Thereâ€™s nothing I like better than a good bit of trashâ€¦ and whatâ€™s trash without a buddy to share it with?? Please accept <emphasis>this gift</>. And if you donâ€™t like it, just re-trash it! Later!
- <name>Rufus</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_11_Body:
This <emphasis>specimen</> was brought to my attention recently. I know you're an expert in these matters, so I'm sending it on to you.
<name>Professor Paige</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_12_Body:
Turns out, the rent for the current arcade space is <negative>WAY</> too high. Gotta get rid of my back stock before I start looking for a new location. Looks like it's your lucky day.
Businessly, <name>Trespasser Defector</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_02_Body:
What's good? Found <emphasis>this</> on the beach and thought, "Hey, I know someone who would love this." Just brush the sand off and it should be fine.
Hot dog hugs, <name>The Brat</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_18_Body:
You have been honored with <emphasis>a present</> from the Viscount of the Midnight Rain! Thatâ€™s, umâ€¦ me, for your information. Anyway, Iâ€™ve sent you a gift. Enjoy it.
In darkened skies, <name>Raven</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_10_Body:
You. You've been hustling. You've been grinding. You've been doing <b>GREAT</>! You deserve a treat.
- <name>Kyra</>
ST_Sprout_DailyRewardMail.DailyReward_19_Body:
Youâ€™ve got the poise of a cat and the heart of a lion. In all my nine lives, I havenâ€™t met someone as fun as you. Hereâ€™s <emphasis>a gift</>. (I promise itâ€™s not a dead mouse.)
Cheers, <name>Tabby</>

ST_Sprout_LootBundleDatabase.LootBundleRewards_OverflowHeader: [Debug]Your hands were full, so I mailed this to you.
